description: Conversion of two existing 3-bed self-contained flats at first and second floor level (Use Class C3) into four self-contained flats at first and second floor level (2x1bed and 2xstudio) (Use Class C3) including roof terraces and alterations to fenestration at rear first floor.  Provision of bicycle parking and refuse recycling storage.
